document.full_text: bp, the oil giant responsible for the worst oil spill in u.s. history, came close to winning a safety award from lobby group oil & gas uk on wednesday.
document.title: bp narrowly misses out on safety award
lines_and_colors: bp, the oil giant responsible for the worst oil spill in u.s. history, came close to winning a safety award from lobby group oil & gas uk on wednesday.
